#read in .csv file
co2perCap <- read.csv(file="data/co2_emissions_tonnes_per_person_gapminder.csv")

#co2_report function
```{r}
co2_report <- function(country, year){
  dat <- co2perCap[co2perCap$country==country, year]
  report <- dat
  return(report)
}
```

#Use print() at the end to get "tonnes CO2 per person per year"
